#sownArea=data[data.columns=="sown area"]
harvestedArea=data["harvested area"].tail(15) 
sownArea=data["sown area"].tail(15)

plt.hist(harvestedArea,color="red", alpha=0.2)
plt.hist(sownArea,color="blue",alpha=0.2)

plt.show()
